entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add integration test for Inheritance margin #55714
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Benchmark algorithm options for LongestCommonSubsequence #55712
    untriaged
  • Re-enable MetadataReference integration test #55711
    Area-IDE, Integration-Test, untriaged, Infraswat, 17.0
  • AD0001: Could not resolve type with token 01000094 from typeref (expected class 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.BaseParameterSyntax #55708
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Roslyn allows pointers to `Span<T>` if runtime assemblies are referenced directly #55707
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Internal modifier added to partial classes breaks new project creation for WinForms, WebTools and anything using partial classes in their templates #55703
    Bug, Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Urgency-Soon, 17.0
  • Unexpected logger failure when opening a solution #55702
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Introduce local doesn't use var keyword #55698
    Bug, help wanted, Area-IDE, Investigation Required, 17.0
  • CompilerGeneratedAttribute not applied to all generated functions #55697
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Overload resolution fails in complex scenario with Delegate overloads and extension methods #55691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.0
  • Warning "CS1701: Assuming assembly reference 'mscorlib, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089' used by 'xxx' matches identity 'mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089' of 'mscorlib', you may need to supply runtime policy" is not generated anymore #55690
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Scripting using Basic.Reference.Assemblies does not work #55689
    Bug, help wanted, Area-Interactive, Backlog
  • Source Generator should generate source code that is usable by projects that reference the source generator project. #55688
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Closed

  • Getting a message that a new .editorconfig was found and asking if I want to add it to the solution, but i already have one as part of the solution #51785
    Bug, Area-IDE, Investigation Required, Backlog
  • System.ArgumentNullException while opening .editorconfig file #53831
    Bug, Area-IDE, 17.0
  • Method group invocation syntax resolves Enumerable rather than Queryable #55325
    Area-IDE, Resolution-Not Applicable, Resolution-Not Reproducible, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.1
  • Command line way to apply code fixes #48561
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Need Design Review, Dev17 IDE Priority, Backlog
  • `TypeLoadException` resulted by using interpolated string in PowerShell #55609
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, 17.0
  • False IDE0055 warning (Fix formatting) for extended property patterns #55328
    Bug, help wanted, Area-Analyzers, Backlog
  • C# is auto-completing braces even though settings is: Off #54920
    Bug, help wanted, Area-IDE, Developer Community, IDE-CodeStyle, 17.0
  • Overload resolution binds lambda argument to method with `Delegate` parameter with `-langversion:10` even when delegate type cannot be inferred #55319
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0.P4

Updated

  • Add option to disable graphical .editorconfig UI #54925
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Developer Community, Feature - Editor Config UI, 17.0
  • Exhaustiveness check quacked on nested deconstruction #55719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • String interpolation produces incorrect output for concatenated strings #55569
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    Area-Compilers, Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Transient failure in test AsyncIteratorWithCustomCode #34207
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, 17.0
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Area-Infrastructure, Test, Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Test, Backlog
  • Assertion failure in CustomAttributesBag`1.get_IsEarlyDecodedWellKnownAttributeDataComputed #49026
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Area-Interactive, Test, Flaky, Disabled Test, Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
    Bug, Area-Interactive, Test, Disabled Test
  • Attempt to load System.Runtime reference assembly for execution causes test failure #53391
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, 17.0
  • Test plan for enhanced #line directives #54509
    Area-Compilers, Test, 17.0
  • Test process crash on Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.EditorFeatures.UnitTests.dll #55639
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, untriaged, Infraswat
  • ICompositorDesktopInterop throws exception in TFM .NET 5 #55705
    untriaged
  • Hang in Inline-Rename when there are errors in the method #55140
    Bug, Area-IDE, Area-Performance, 17.0
  • Investigate purpose of Logger.LogBlock calls #55685
    Area-Analyzers, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Investigation Required, 17.1
  • Allow access to Compilation that matches a C# Hot Reload #55683
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Interactive-EnC, 17.0
  • Support retrieving original type name from mangled type name #55651
    Area-Compilers, Feature Request, Area-Language Design, Backlog
  • Constant, frequent crash VS 16.11 with Source Generator use #55658
    Bug, Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, 17.0
  • Invert If refactoring is missing unit tests for Visual Basic #55677
    Area-IDE, Test, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • Hot Reload test scenario: Hot Reload notifications and reloadable types #55561
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, Test-Scenario, untriaged
  • Renaming a parameter on a copied&pasted method renames also the parameters in the body of the original method #52497
    Bug, help wanted, Area-IDE, Investigation Required, Need Design Review, Backlog
  • Unnecessary await spilling for locals #54629
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Tenet-Performance, Compiler.Next
  • [LSP] Initial semantic tokens should be computed against frozen compilation #55637
    Area-IDE, Urgency-Soon, Concept-Continuous Improvement, LSP, 17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't add accessibility modifiers to partial classes in new documents #55713
    Area-IDE
  • Change the head of inheritance margin background to InActiveTextBox #55710
    Area-IDE
  • Implement PackageSettingsPersister.TryFetch #55709
    Area-IDE
  • Skip flaky test #55706
    Area-Interactive
  • Add feature to simplify code to use the new extended property patterns when available. #55704
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Address Interpolated Strings test plan #55701
    Area-Compilers
  • Pass updated types to the debugger #55699
    Area-Interactive, 17.0.P4
  • Have inheritance-margin hold onto data that does *not* point back at Solution instances. #55696
    Area-IDE
  • Specify paths and shell on Windows #55694
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LSP] Add semantic tokens caching case #55692
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously (part 2) #55687
    Area-IDE
  • KeybindingResetDetector refactoring #55686
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • fixed broken link #55693
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Add two more icons to the inheritance margin. #55383
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Treat overload with Delegate parameter as not applicable if lambda delegate type cannot be inferred #55357
    Area-Compilers, 17.0.P4
  • Use string.Format when an interpolated string part is dynamic #55642
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove unused interface #55684
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • EnC - Parameterless struct constructors #55718
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC
  • Don't consider syntax trees changed if the compilation is the same #55715
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Change Inheritance Margin Header style #55533
    Area-IDE
  • Update Arcade and require .NET 6 Preview 7 SDK #55681
    Area-Infrastructure
  • IEditAndContinueSolutionProvider #55717
    Area-Interactive
  • Use directory-scoped ALCs to load analyzers in .NET Core #55098
    Area-Compilers
  • Have add-using respect EditorBrowsable attributes. #55669
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Lazily evaluate the root node for syntax trees #55716
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Disallow nullable suppression in patterns #54072
    Area-Compilers
  • 🧹 Services cleanup following previous review #49127
    Area-IDE
  • Consider MatchPriority when comparing CompletionItems when filter text is lowercase only #55562
    Area-IDE
  • Add Reference refactoring and imports #55581
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • 🐇 Ensure recoverable syntax trees are pushed to temporary storage #55399
    Area-IDE
  • Show destination name #55650
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive
  • Move inheritance margin to its own view margin #55674
    Area-IDE
  • Run dotnet-format on Roslyn #55679
    Area-Compilers
  • Update packages version #55655
    Area-Infrastructure
  • testing crash in error reporting #55657
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0 #55653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously #55682
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to installing/uninstalling nuget packages in the BG instead of the UI thread #55671
    Area-IDE
  • Fix compile errors in test method code. #55613
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't skip suppressors with /skipAnalyzers #54969
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't hold onto documents in 'Find' features #55635
    Area-IDE
  • Add an assert message to help diagnose intermittent test failure #52828
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build #55605
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #55436
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update to latest async lightbulb api #55207
    Area-IDE
  • Bug fix extract local function errors C#7 and below #55446
    Area-IDE
